metadata.title: CVE-2023-32216 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 112. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 113.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
